This game is amazing. I have never played any of portal games before and I wanted something to play with my brother, so Portal 2 looked pretty fun. I bought the games in a bundle for the discount. Most people recommend playing Portal 1 first because of the story connecting to the second game, but I was a little hesitant since it was made in 2007 and all. But that made no difference at all in reality. This game surprisingly looks pretty good graphically and plays VERY good. Who would have thought that just two portals, awesome physics, a corrupted AI, and puzzles would be so fun. And the story was also very good. I started playing Portal 2 today and it is just as amazing times 10. More games really need to implement the ability to pick up random stuff and throw it around, that kind of stuff is fun to me. Oh by the way the cake was definitely a lie. God Bless
